title: Watch Chrissy Teigen Fangirl Over Lion Star Sunny Pawar at the Oscars (Video)

persons.name: chrissy teigen fangirl over lion star sunny pawar

text:
By Mehera Bonner Feb 26, 2017 Chrissy Teigen and John Legend hit the Oscars red carpet and immediately started serving #relationshipgoals and #couplegoals and literally every single other kind of #goals known to man. But between moments like this... Advertisement - Continue Reading Below ...Chrissy found a second to completely fan out over Lion star Sunny Pawar. seven seconds that demonstrate why everyone loves @chrissyteigen pic.twitter.com/DFfwZHw2FV 
â€” shauna (@goldengateblond) February 27, 2017 Our hearts are officially melting Wicked Witch of the West style, and also can we please take a moment to LOL/awww at John Legend fervently trying to capture this moment on his phone?
